content:
Insurer: ABC Insurance
Plan Name: Health Secure Plus

Premium:
- ₹18,000 per year for a family floater plan

Sum Insured:
- ₹10 Lakhs shared across all insured family members

Deductible:
- ₹25,000 per claim (the policyholder must pay this amount before insurance coverage applies)

Coverage Includes:
- In-patient hospitalization expenses including room rent, doctor fees, medicines, and ICU charges
- Day-care procedures such as chemotherapy, dialysis, and cataract surgery
- Organ donor hospitalization expenses related to transplant
- Pre- and post-hospitalization expenses

Exclusions:
- OPD treatment
- Dental treatment unless due to accident
- Cosmetic procedures

Waiting Periods:
- Initial waiting period: 30 days
- Pre-existing diseases: 48 months

Family Coverage:
- Family floater covering up to 4 members

Insurer: SecureLife Insurance
Plan Name: Family Care Advantage

Premium:
- ₹22,500 per year

Sum Insured:
- ₹15 Lakhs family floater

Deductible:
- No deductible

Coverage Includes:
- Hospitalization including ICU expenses
- Day-care treatments
- Emergency ambulance services
- Annual health check-ups

Exclusions:
- OPD expenses
- Infertility treatments
- Cosmetic surgery

Waiting Periods:
- Initial waiting period: 30 days
- Pre-existing diseases: 36 months

Family Coverage:
- Covers 2 adults and up to 3 children

Insurer: Prime Health Insurance
Plan Name: Gold Family Shield

Premium:
- ₹28,000 per year

Sum Insured:
- ₹20 Lakhs family floater

Deductible:
- No deductible

Coverage Includes:
- Hospitalization and ICU
- Day-care procedures
- Maternity and newborn cover
- Organ donor expenses

Exclusions:
- Cosmetic procedures
- Non-allopathic treatment

Waiting Periods:
- Initial waiting period: 30 days
- Pre-existing diseases: 24 months
- Maternity: 24 months

Family Coverage:
- Family floater for up to 4 members

Insurer: TrustHealth Insurance
Plan Name: Family Secure Max

Premium:
- ₹25,000 per year

Sum Insured:
- ₹15 Lakhs family floater

Deductible:
- ₹15,000 per claim

Coverage Includes:
- Hospitalization and ICU
- Day-care procedures
- Organ donor expenses
- Domiciliary treatment

Exclusions:
- OPD treatment
- Cosmetic and dental procedures

Waiting Periods:
- Initial waiting period: 30 days
- Pre-existing diseases: 36 months

Family Coverage:
- Covers 2 adults and 2 children

Insurer: HealthTrust Insurance
Plan Name: Complete Care Family

Premium:
- ₹30,000 per year

Sum Insured:
- ₹20 Lakhs family floater

Deductible:
- No deductible

Coverage Includes:
- Hospitalization and ICU
- Day-care procedures
- Maternity and newborn cover
- Organ donor expenses
- Domiciliary hospitalization

Exclusions:
- Cosmetic procedures
- Non-allopathic treatment

Waiting Periods:
- Initial waiting period: 30 days
- Pre-existing diseases: 24 months
- Maternity: 24 months

Family Coverage:
- Family floater for up to 4 members

Insurer: WellCare Insurance
Plan Name: Health Plus Saver

Premium:
- ₹16,500 per year for family floater

Sum Insured:
- ₹8 Lakhs shared across insured members

Deductible:
- ₹20,000 per claim

Coverage Includes:
- In-patient hospitalization including room rent and ICU charges
- Day-care procedures such as minor surgeries
- Emergency ambulance services
- Pre-hospitalization diagnostic expenses

Exclusions:
- OPD consultations and routine check-ups
- Dental and vision treatments
- Cosmetic procedures

Waiting Periods:
- Initial waiting period: 30 days
- Pre-existing diseases: 48 months

Family Coverage:
- Family floater covering up to 3 members

Insurer: SafeHands Insurance
Plan Name: Family Health Standard

Premium:
- ₹19,500 per year

Sum Insured:
- ₹10 Lakhs family floater

Deductible:
- ₹10,000 per claim

Coverage Includes:
- Hospitalization expenses including ICU and specialist fees
- Day-care procedures
- Ambulance services up to policy limits
- Post-hospitalization follow-up treatment

Exclusions:
- OPD treatment and pharmacy expenses
- Dental treatment unless accidental
- Mental illness-related treatments

Waiting Periods:
- Initial waiting period: 30 days
- Pre-existing diseases: 36 months

Family Coverage:
- Covers up to 2 adults and 2 children

Insurer: LifeGuard Insurance
Plan Name: Premium Health Elite

Premium:
- ₹35,000 per year

Sum Insured:
- ₹25 Lakhs family floater

Deductible:
- No deductible

Coverage Includes:
- Hospitalization including ICU and critical care
- Advanced day-care procedures
- Organ transplant including donor expenses
- Annual health check-ups
- Emergency and air ambulance services

Exclusions:
- Experimental or unproven treatments
- Cosmetic procedures
- Treatment outside India

Waiting Periods:
- Initial waiting period: 30 days
- Pre-existing diseases: 24 months

Family Coverage:
- Family floater covering up to 5 members

Insurer: ShieldCare Insurance
Plan Name: Smart Health Advantage

Premium:
- ₹21,000 per year

Sum Insured:
- ₹12 Lakhs family floater

Deductible:
- ₹15,000 per claim

Coverage Includes:
- Hospitalization and ICU expenses
- Advanced day-care procedures
- Domiciliary treatment when hospitalization is not possible
- Pre- and post-hospitalization expenses

Exclusions:
- OPD consultations
- Dental and cosmetic procedures
- Infertility treatments

Waiting Periods:
- Initial waiting period: 30 days
- Pre-existing diseases: 36 months

Family Coverage:
- Covers up to 4 family members

Insurer: PrimeSecure Insurance
Plan Name: Total Family Care

Premium:
- ₹27,500 per year

Sum Insured:
- ₹18 Lakhs family floater

Deductible:
- No deductible

Coverage Includes:
- Hospitalization including ICU and specialist treatment
- Day-care and minimally invasive procedures
- Maternity and newborn baby coverage
- Organ donor hospitalization expenses
- Emergency ambulance services

Exclusions:
- Cosmetic treatments not medically required
- Non-allopathic treatments
- OPD consultations

Waiting Periods:
- Initial waiting period: 30 days
- Pre-existing diseases: 24 months
- Maternity: 24 months

Family Coverage:
- Family floater for up to 4 members
